mapper.select: select * from user where status ="1" and user_name = #{userName}

select u.id as id, u.user_name as userName, u.password as passWord, u.email as email, u.phone_number as phoneNumber, u.role_id as roleId, u.integration as integration, f.file_path as userIconPath, u.user_description as userDescription from user as u left join files as f on u.user_icon_id = f.id where u.status ="1" and u.user_name = #{userName} and u.password = #{passWord}

select u.id as id, u.user_name as userName, u.password as passWord, u.email as email, u.phone_number as phoneNumber, u.role_id as roleId, u.integration as integration, f.file_path as userIconPath, u.user_description as userDescription from user as u left join files as f on u.user_icon_id = f.id where u.status ="1" and u.user_name = #{username}
select username from auto_login where status ="1" and cookie = #{cookie} and client_ip=#{clientIp} and sysdate() > create_time and out_of_date > sysdate()
mapper.delete: delete from auto_login where create_time > sysdate() or sysdate() > out_of_date
